description: Dual USB ports provide a total of 3.6A (1.2A & 2.4A ports) to simultaneously charge multiple devices and is conveniently compatible with 12V or 24V systems Integrated, inconspicuous Blue LED provides a visual indication that the charger is securely plugged in and charging your devices Designed with advanced and intelligent microchips to prevent over-charging of your devices and ensure safe operation This simple, elegant and yet essential device will charge your mobile devices at full speed Compact, portable, lightweight design means that it will plug-in securely while in use and travel easily when you are on the go
title: OXA Universal Car Charger Adapter with Dual USB Ports Supports 12V or 24V Systems for iPad, iPhone, Samsung, Android Devices, Tablets, GPS and More (Black)
